query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vocabulary) as vocabulary_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM grammar) as grammar_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sentences) as sentences_count
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user vYSQoPEMjLoro3N.root --database W7xsTD72zLTLxKgC6bEdsv --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vocabulary) as vocabulary_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM grammar) as grammar_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sentences) as sentences_count
